'''Tidal Guide (III)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Seelie]] in the [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]].
